DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate degree post-operative ocular inflammation patient undergoing par plana vitrectomy .
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study Ocular Inflammation Patients Undergoing Pars Plana Vitrectomy
DOC.criteria: Require par plana vitrectomy least 1 eye Best correct visual acuity study eye 20/400 20/40 Use NSAIDs ( topical systemic ) within 14 day Use topical systemic steroid within 30 day Active eye infection either eye Any eye surgery within 6 month Prior par plana vitrectomy , YAG capsulotomy uveitis
